New - Collin Blatt

about

I'm currently a Systems Administrator at Mel Trotter Ministries (meltrotter.org).

I actively work with Windows, Active Directory, Group Policy, Microsoft 365 administration, and most recently Intune. On a daily basis, I use PowerShell to automate many administrative tasks and to improve our department's productivity. Two of the biggest intra-departmental projects I've worked on is for our inventory management and onboarding process.

—

I've also implemented DMARC, DKIM, and BIMI (VMC not purchased yet) for meltrotter.org, heartside.org, and nextstep-wm.org.
